text: Irina Shayk Takes Fashion Week By Storm 01:01 Turns out that when supermodel bombshell Irina Shayk isn't locking lips with boyfriend Bradley Cooper, she's killing it on the catwalk and party scene during fashion week. The leggy beauty was all over New York and London during their respective fashion weeks, proving that she's back to the model... You Might Like Other recent news in Sports
